overview: The Daring Media Group presents its latest cinematic adult feature film, A Country Retreat. Miss Jasmine Jae is the manager of this fine establishment and has personally selected her beautiful staff members for their appearance and abilities. Every girl is under strict instructions to completely satisfy the needs of their guests to ensure their stay is a memorable one. Female director Anjali Kara gathers together a wonderful cast and produces a high end adult movie for you to enjoy.
title: A Country Retreat
